job title: REMOTE Lead Software Engineer - Java, JavaScript, Node.js
job description:
No sponsorship available. No third-party candidates.

Our client, a heavy hitter in the IaaS/PaaS space, delivers cloud solutions and services to businesses on a global scale. With end-to-end solutions and streamlined technology, this company is making good on its mission to provide accessible and affordable cloud technologies.

This high-performance group is looking to hire a motivated Lead Software Engineer to take on a key role for a mission-critical AI project. This person will have the opportunity to work remotely with occasional visits to client sites in the Dallas area.

What you get to do:

  • Design and develop complex solutions using Java, JavaScript, and Node.js
  • Take on a leadership role within the development team
  • Work in tandem with other engineers on paired programming initiatives
  • Gain hands-on experience with cutting-edge tools and technologies while working with this booming start-up

What you need to succeed:

  • Recent professional experience coding with Java
  • Strong hands-on experience with Node.js and JavaScript
  • Experience leading and mentoring software engineering teams
  • Proven ability to complete mission-critical paired programming tasks
  • Experience with object-oriented and MVC design patterns

What’s in it for you:

If you enjoy working from the comfort of your own home, you’re in luck! This remote opportunity allows you to work from home, although you will be expected to visit client sites in the Dallas, Texas area as needed. As an employee, you will have access to our amazing client list, the support of an experienced industry-leading team, and the opportunity to enroll in health benefits packages, including medical, dental, and vision insurance.
